name: Neue Wissenschaft (IAPSOP)
content:
Neue Wissenschaft (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Neue Wissenschaft Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Neue Wissenschaft. Zeitschrift Fur Parapsychologie / Zeitschrift fur kritischen Okkultismus. 1950-1968 Semiannual Bern, Baden, Germany, ehen Oberengstringen bei Zurich, Switzerland. Language: German. Publisher: Gyr-Verlag; Francke Verlag; Dr. Peter Ringger. Editor: Peter Ringger. Succeeded by: Zeitschrift fur Parapsychologie und Grenzgebiete der Psychologie 1/1, 1950-1968. OCLC notes that this was a supplement to and then absorbed by Zeitschrift fur Parapsychology in 1970. Contributions by or excerpts from Fanny Moser Hoppe (1872-1953), Justinus Kerner, J.B. Rhine, P.D. Ouspensky, J.B. Rhine, R. Tischner, Willy Schrödter, Wilfried Daim, and Herbert Fritsche. NYPL; LOC. Issues:Neue Wissenschaft V1 1950
